title: Pent-Up Demand Is Sparking Spot Bitcoin ETF Surge, Says Grayscale CEO
description: On March 1, Michael Sonnenshein, CEO of Grayscale, offered his insights on CNBC’s “Squawk on the Street” regarding the recent Bitcoin rally, the launch of the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust ETF (GBTC), potential outflows, and the broader implications for the cryptocurrency market. The Run of Bitcoin and the Impact of ETFs Sonnenshein attributed Bitcoin’s remarkable performance […]

title: Eurozone sees cooling inflation as February rates dip to 2.6%
description: February brought a bit of a chill to the Eurozone’s inflation rates, cooling down to a modest 2.6%. title: LUNC’s Price Surges, Market Cap Hit $1 Billion: What’s Happening?
description:
